name: Souls of Amethyst
description:
A short project made by 3 peoples during 7 days.

Team:

3D Artist - Vorunah

UI and Animation - Manon Fleury Mamadounka

Programming - Kevin Pedatte @kpedatte

Controls
  • Left Joystick (or Arrow Keys) : Move
  • A (or Space Key) while moving : Dash
  • A (or Space Key) without moving : Parry
  • X (or C Key) : Attack
  • Hold X (or C Key) :  Charged Attack
